Hi everyone,

Just a quick update for those interested in the DeDuplicator.=


As of today, the website for it is http://deduplicator.sourceforge.net.
T=
he software has been moved to SourceForge and, accordingly, now has
anon CV=
S access as well as all the other free stuff SF offers such as
issue tracke=
rs etc.

Latest stable is (still) 0.2.0.

There is no continuous integratio=
ns set up, but interim releases are
made available when there is a reason t=
o do so.

Currently there isn't much development going on. The software has=

proven very stable and has been used in production crawls both here in
Ice=
land and in Denmark (Netarkivet.dk) for large crawls. 

Future work will be=
 primarily related to compatibility with the WARC
file format currently bei=
ng developed. 

Best,
Kris
